name: Sunchaser
description: Not too far in the future cities have grown to cover the skies and the average person will live their life surrounded by the neon lights. You have decided that for once in your life you want to see the sunrise yourself but to do that you must make your way to the top of the highest skyscraper.  In this game you will be racing on roof tops to climb higher and higher before the sun rises. Watch out for dangerous obstacles and angry guards!
